page.title: 18PARKS AND SPORTS CENTRES
page.content:
{PARKS The parks are open all day, there is no charge for admission. There are six parks in the district. GRID REFERENCES:- Hayes Park 09,80 Playing fields(2) 011,82 Beaconsfield Park 011,82 Willow Tree Parks(2) 011,81 In these parks there are open spaces for ball-games, swings and slides.
{SPORTS CENTRES There are two sports centres in the Borough. They are Hayes Manor Centre and Hayes Stadium. The Hayes Manor centre does not open for the general public until 5.30 p.m. because it is used by a school during the day. The stadium is open during the day and closes at 10.30 p.m.
